lead_paragraph: The hit musical is about to go on the road and regional theaters see it as a way to convert the hunger for tickets into subscriptions and memberships.

headline.print_headline: Well Beyond Broadway,  ‘Hamilton’ Is Selling Tickets
headline.main: Want to See ‘Hamilton’ in a City Near You? Buy a Subscription and Wait Two Years

snippet: The hit musical is about to go on the road and regional theaters see it as a way to convert the hunger for tickets into subscriptions and memberships.
abstract: Hit musical Hamilton will begin national tour and theaters across country prepare by pushing sales of subscriptions for 2016-17 seasons in exchange for guaranteed advance tickets to show; theaters justify decision among many criticisms of price gouging.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Kennedy, John F, Center for the Performing Arts
